q: What is your booking and cancellation policy?
a: Reservations can be cancelled up to 48 hours before arrival without penalty. Cancellations within 48 hours are subject to a one-night charge. We recommend booking directly for the best rates and flexible cancellation options.

q: What are your check-in and check-out times?
a: Check-in is at 3:00 PM and check-out is at 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out are available upon request and may incur additional charges depending on availability.
Yes, we offer complimentary valet parking for all hotel guests. Our secure parking area can accommodate all vehicle types including SUVs and larger vehicles.

q: Are pets allowed at the hotel?
a: We welcome pets with advance notice. A pet fee of PKR 2,000 per night applies, and pets must be supervised at all times. Please contact us before booking to ensure pet-friendly accommodation.

q: Do you offer airport transfer services?
a: Yes, we provide luxury airport transfer services from Islamabad International Airport. The service must be booked in advance and is available for an additional fee based on vehicle type and group size.

q: Is the hotel accessible for guests with disabilities?
a: HSQ Hotels is committed to accessibility. We offer wheelchair-accessible rooms, elevators, ramps, and specially trained staff to assist guests with disabilities. Please inform us of any special requirements when booking.
